mapper.select: select CONCAT('https://www.datacenterlab.cn/onloadImg/',infoImg) infoImg from flow_info_img where infoId=#{id}

select count(1) as aa from flow_info_read where infoId=#{infoId}
and staffCode=#{staffCode}

SELECT COUNT(*) as unreadCount,typeName from flow_info fi FORCE INDEX(typeName) INNER JOIN flow_info_accept fia ON fi.id=fia.infoId INNER JOIN datacenter_personnel dp on fi.infoSendStaffCode=dp.人员编码 where infoAcceptName in (#{user.staffCode},#{user.department} ,#{user.BU},'公司') AND fi.typeName in ('系统信息','个人信息','兴趣爱好','百利新闻','兴趣爱好','心里测评','其他') and (SELECT status from flow_info_read fir where fir.infoId=fi.id and fir.staffCode=#{user.staffCode}) IS null GROUP BY typeName
select role from authority where staffCode=#{staffCode}
